resources.string:
The Advanced Swords Mod adds more than hundred different swords all with their own unique abilities, crafting recipes and super cool textures. A lot of the time in Minecraft goes to fighting mobs, at least if you are in survival mode, so why not upgrade and access a hundred more swords to optimize the fun further.
 
 Getting Started
 There are over a hundred different swords all worth testing. Because of the extreme amount we can’t show you them all but you can find all the crafting recipes further down.
 
 There are two types of new storage items: a quiver and a sword holder. They can be used to hold up to 6 stacks of arrows and 5 swords. Tap on the ground with the quiver or sword holder to open the inventory.
 
 Item IDs and Crafting Recipes
 White Hi-Tech Sword (711) – 2 quartz \+ 1 stick
 Pirate Sword (712) – 3 iron ingots \+ 1 stick
 The Needle (713) – 2 iron ingots \+ 1 stick
 Wizard’s Sword (714) – 2 diamonds \+ 2 gold ingots \+ 1 stick
 Cyan Hi-Tech Sword (715) – 2 cyan dyes \+ 1 white hi-tech sword
 Green Hi-Tech Sword (716) – 2 cactus green \+ 1 white hi-tech sword
 Red Hi-Tech Sword (717) – 2 rose red \+ 1 white hi-tech sword
 Yellow Hi-Tech Sword (718) – 2 dandelion yellow \+ 1 white hi-tech sword
 Purple Hi-Tech Sword (719) – 2 purple dyes \+ 1 white hi-tech sword
 Blue Hi-Tech Sword (720) – 2 light blue dyes \+ 1 white hi-tech sword
 Sponge Sword (722) – 2 sponges \+ 1 stick
